Key Match Events: Lane Thomas and José Ramírez hit back-to-back homers in the eighth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Cleveland Guardians' offense came alive, scoring six runs and securing a victory against the Rays
The Guardians are now 39-19 when Josh Naylor has at least one RBI
The team hopes that Lane Thomas's performance continues in the playoffs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Josh Naylor hit a single into left field after stepping in with the infield in and bases loaded, driving in two runs
José Ramírez hit a home run in the sixth inning, demonstrating his power hitting
